website_summaries.verdict: These figures do an amazing job of highlighting those memeable moments from the Spongebob cartoon, and will look great on your shelf or desktop.
pros: Captures the memorable Imaginaaation joke from the cartoon series
Other Spongebob meme figures like SpongeGar are available

customer_reviews.title: G R A D U A A A A T I O N
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Spongebob grad party I'm throwing for my daughter in a week. One star off only because the rainbow tends to droop forward, but that's nothing that some tape can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute and I love the size of them
customer_reviews.author: Sheena l.

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaws
customer_reviews.text: The figure itself looks great, the problem is Spongebob's arms begin to bend forward almost immediately because of the weight of the rainbow. I'm going to have to use some superglue or something to keep it from falling forward. Also, the designers should have considered adding pegs to the underside of his shoes and include a stand for him, like they do for some of the funko pop figures. All in all, the designers should have known better, it's obvious this figure had design flaws.
customer_reviews.author: R. T.

customer_reviews.title: 30 Days Worth of Rainbow Fun
customer_reviews.text: I’ve now had this figure for under two months and the rainbow will no longer stay up. The arms have begun to fail and will no longer keep the rainbow in the proper upright position. Now, the rainbow is barely holding on and nearly horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: lgndavison

customer_reviews.title: Complaint about arms are correct
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this figure! He's a great size and his cheerful complexion is lovely. There was another review that mentions his arms bending forward after some time, and I also found this to be true, unfortunately. An easy way to fix this is to apply a tiny bit of super glue at the point where the rainbow meets his forehead, with a toothpick. Fixes this issue perfectly. It is unfortunate that I had to do this, but it was little effort, and now I have a wonderful spongebob figure.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Out of the packaging, he just falls flat on his rainbow. ☹️
customer_reviews.text: I'm assuming the manufacturer was assuming that folks would never remove SpongeBob from his packaging. That's the only explanation I can think of for letting this get past quality control. As others, many others, have mentioned SpongeBob is off balance and can't seem to keep his grip on the rainbow.
customer_reviews.author: Matt R

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot bigger than expected. However, I'm very disappointed. It doesn't stand up on its own and the rainbow doesn't stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis E. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: SWEET! SWEET! SWEET VICTORY IN THIS PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: This item is so much cooler than the picture shows. It is huge and looks so cool on a computer desk! I was expecting Spongebob to be about the size of an iPhone or a pop figure but he is so much bigger and just triumphs over all other decorations at work. I display him proudly! Get one - trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Domino Prasky

customer_reviews.title: Nice funny not well made
customer_reviews.text: I love it but not a good build. Rainbow constantly falls out of hand doesn’t stand easily. A little More efffort so it make it right should have been done for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Imagination! Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expected a Spongebob that big. Colors are beautiful, the printing and material is high quality. Perfect for Spongebob Squarepants fans!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Have to glue rainbow to his head!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this figure but you have to glue the rainbow to his head because it doesn’t stay up! Not happy about that!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ML0818

customer_reviews.title: Yarn
customer_reviews.text: I see people complaining about a serious design flaw. "The weight of the rainbow makes the arms bend forward and eventually the whole figure topples forward and the rainbow falls off." Just to be clear. It happened to me, too. My answer? Yarn. I fixed it with yarn. Other than that, it is a great product so stop complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Park

customer_reviews.title: It is nice and holds well enough.
customer_reviews.text: Baught it because "Spungebob" and "IMAGINATION" are perfect ideas for a classroom and my students loved it.
customer_reviews.author: JWJ

customer_reviews.title: Huge!!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be the size of a Funko Pop but this thing is huge and looks cool. The rainbow can come off quite easily but you can just superglue it.
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than POPs
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, bigger than I expected. Thought it would be about the size of a Funko Pop, but the figure and the box together are about 3x that.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I love this Spongebob
customer_reviews.text: I love this Spongebob figure. It arrived quickly. It is bigger then it looks in the pictures nit a complaint though.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Incredible buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s huge!! I didn’t know it was gonna be that big. I love it. 😍
customer_reviews.author: SSchott

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is how his hands have a hard time holding the rainbow, plus he's hard to standup on his own. But, I love spongebob, so..
customer_reviews.author: Angie H.

customer_reviews.title: Rainbow Day Every Day!
customer_reviews.text: A joy to look at and guaranteed to make you smile each day!
customer_reviews.author: Optimist

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, but the rainbow is not attached and frequently falls off. The rainbow fits into his hands, kind of like a Tupperware lid, but a lid that doesn’t fit quite right.
customer_reviews.author: S.Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Really Cool Toy
customer_reviews.text: It was bigger than expected but it looks great. Can easily fit on a desk of some sort. I got scared when the rainbow fell out but realized you can fit it right back in and looks great. Great purchase overall
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Kogan

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift I absolutely Love it and highly recommend. Great toy and decorations
customer_reviews.author: Kynnedi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was much bigger than I thought. It looks to be of very high quality and is bright and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Heather K.

customer_reviews.title: Balance is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Read reviews on the balance of the figure, however ours is fine. I believe the manufacture has fixed the flaw or maybe a bad batch happen to go out. My daughter loves it! And all her friends want one now! Lol They are perfect gifts or centerpieces for spongebob theme parties. The product is excellent quality and awesome detail.
customer_reviews.author: M Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great figure, weak arms.
customer_reviews.text: After having this amazing figure for about a week, the rainbow has been slowly leaning forward. Too heavy for his weak arms I guess. Otherwise, great figure!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hughes

product_meta.title: Imagination Spongebob Masterpiece Meme
product_meta.description: Crazy for SpongeBob memes? We are too! Now you can collect your favorite SpongeBob memes with the Masterpiece Memes vinyl figure collection! This assortment brings to life the most popular SpongeBob memes from the interwebs as glorious vinyl figures. A perfect gift for the meme lover in your life. Assortment includes: Imaginaaation SpongeBob, SpongeGar, Handsome Squidward, Mocking SpongeBob and Surprised Patrick. Sold individually. You can collect them all. SpongeBob Masterpiece Memes Imaginaaation SpongeBob is made for fans ages 6+ and is approximately 8” tall.
feature_bullets: THE BEST OF THE BEST: Includes the most popular SpongeBob SquarePants memes: Imaginaaation SpongeBob, SpongeGar, Handsome Squidward, Mocking SpongeBob and Surprised Patrick.
ABOUT IMAGINAAATION SPONGEBOB MEME: This iconic moment was originally seen in the Season 3 episode "Idiot Box."
Each collectible vinyl figures measures approximately 8” tall.
SpongeBob Masterpiece Memes Imaginaaation SpongeBob is made for fans ages 6+.
Includes one SpongeBob SquarePants Masterpiece Meme Imaginaaation SpongeBob vinyl figure.
MEMES YOU CAN COLLECT: Hoppin’ clams! Crazy for SpongeBob memes? We are too! Now you can collect your favorite SpongeBob memes with the Masterpiece Memes vinyl figure collection!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars184 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
